name: DownBelow
description:
This is an underwater horror game made for an inter-college games competition where the theme word was - "Uncertainty". The basis is that you start on a lifeboat because your ship has been damaged and is wrecked on the ocean floor. You need to jump down and retrieve as many materials as you can whilst avoiding whatever lies down below. As of now its an ongoing project which we wish to further polish and fix as there are some known bugs such as collision errors.

Controls -

WASD - Movement

F - Flashlight

E - Interact

ESC - Quit Game

Credits -

Jacob Maidens - Programming \ UE4 implementation

Bradley Borysenko - 3D modelling

Jack Townend - Sound Design
